publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2813 Christine Grahame: Borders Pharmaceutical Company Expands into Lucrative US Market—That the Parliament recognises and congratulates Galashiels-based pharmaceutical company ProStrakan for the launch in the US market of Sancuso, a medical patch that helps prevent sickness in patients undergoing chemotherapy; notes that the projected annual sales in the United States of America from the release of this product to help cancer patients are expected to reach more than $100 million; considers that the launch of Sancuso demonstrates the cutting-edge medical developments of pharmaceutical companies like ProStrakan, and wishes the company and its employees well as it continues to grow.
